name: LOST (itch) (abdulrafaykhan)
description: Your plane has crashed, and you find yourself trapped on an island. Being a sole survivor of the catastrophe, you've got to scavenge the island, obtaining whatever resources are available, with the ultimate goal of escaping the island. However, the task isn't as simple as it sounds, for there are the creatures that inhabit the jungle of the island, and one thing's for certain: they aren't too fond of visitors.
